name: 2025 8th International Conference on Circuits, Systems and Simulation
content: Publication: Like the previous conferences, submitted papers will be sent to around 2-3 reviewers for peer review. And accepted papers will be published into ICCSS 2025 Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted to major databases for indexing, including Ei Compendex, SCOPUS, Google Scholar et al. Accepted papers in ICCSS 2017-2023 have been indexed by EI Compendex & Scopus already. ICCSS 2024 conference proceedings is being published by IOP and will be online and retrieved soon
